ORIGAM Documentation : LoadXml Method

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Nov 21, 2014

Using this method you can read an XML file from a server disk drive.

PARAMETERS

Parameter
Type
Description
PathString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)A path to an input XML file.
